statements: SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_method FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT payment_method, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE recipient_id = 456 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, recipient_id, payment_method FROM payment_transactions WHERE fraud_detection = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_method, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 1001 AND recipient_id = 2001;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE fraud_detection = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM TransactionHistory ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, status FROM TransactionHistory WHERE user_id = 12345 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM TransactionHistory WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM TransactionHistory WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT c.name, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.status = 'approved';

SELECT t.transaction_id, c.email, f.fraud_type FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN fraud_activities f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.name, c.address, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.name, c.address ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT account_id, account_number, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, c.customer_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.account_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT f.detection_id, t.transaction_id, f.detection_date, f.detection_reason FROM fraud_detection f JOIN transactions t ON f.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_details ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE method_type = 'Credit Card';
SELECT log_id, log_info FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM user_details WHERE full_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT method_type, last_four_digits FROM payment_methods WHERE method_type = 'Credit Card';
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_info, log_date FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT detection_id, transaction_id, fraud_status, detection_date FROM fraud_detection ORDER BY detection_date ASC;
